academy_screen.label-description: The Invest it! Academy helps you navigate the world of business and finance. We produce free, unbiased learning videos for you. Take a look now!

logged-in.label-description: Please enter a new password. You cannot use passwords that you have already used before. The new passwort must not contain your e-mail address and needs to have at least 6 characters.

logged-out.label-description: Please enter your email address connected to your Linum account. We will send you a verification code along with instructions on how to reset your password.

delete-account.title: Do you really want to delete your account?

killswitch-change.message: If you cancel the process now, the old PIN will remain active.
killswitch-change.title: Are you sure?

killswitch-initialize.message: If you cancel the process now, the PIN lock will be deactivated again.
killswitch-initialize.title: Are you sure?

killswitch-recall.message: When you log out, the PIN lock is deactivated. This allows you to log in normally with your email and password if you forget your PIN code.
killswitch-recall.title: Are you sure?

login-verification.message: You have not yet confirmed your email address. We have sent you a new email to confirm your registration. Please click on the link in the email to activate your account. Please also check your spam folder.
login-verification.title: E-Mail not confirmed

reset-password.message: We have sent you a link to reset your password. Please click on the link in the email to set a new password. Please also check your spam folder.
reset-password.title: Request sent.

signup-verification.message: We have sent you a link to confirm your registration. Please click on the link in the email to activate your account. Please also check your spam folder.
signup-verification.title: Confirm registration

auth.claims-too-large: More requests than allowed are received. Please try again later.
auth.email-already-exists: The specified e-mail is already in use.
auth.email-already-in-use: An account already exists for the email address you entered. If you have forgotten your password, you can reset it at any time using the 'Reset password' function.
auth.id-token-expired: The Authentication ID token has expired.
auth.id-token-revoked: The Authentication ID token has been revoked.
auth.insufficient-permission: Your account is not authorised to log in here. Please check your login details.
auth.internal-error: An internal error has occurred. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-argument: You have made an invalid registration entry. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-claims: You have triggered a registration request that is not allowed. Please contact support@investit-academy.de
auth.invalid-continue-uri: An internal error has occurred. Please try again later.
auth.invalid-creation-time: The server could not validate your time zone. Please check if the time is set correctly on your mobile phone.
auth.invalid-credential: The login information cannot be used for registration. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-disabled-field: If you see this error, we have done something completely wrong. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-email: Your email or password is not correct. Check for spelling errors?
auth.invalid-email-verified: Your email address could not be verified. Look our for spelling errors!
auth.invalid-id-token: The connection to the server malfunctioned. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-last-sign-in-time: The server could not validate your time zone. Please check if the time is set correctly on your mobile phone.
auth.invalid-oauth-responsetype: There was an error with OAuth. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-password: Your email or password is not correct. Check for spelling errors?
auth.invalid-photo-url: The file for your profile picture is incorrect. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-session-cookie-duration: A necessary cookie could not be set.  Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.invalid-uid: Your User ID is incorrect.  Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.missing-android-pkg-name: The app data on your device is incorrect. Please reinstall the app. If the error persists, please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.missing-continue-uri: Your registration request could not be processed. Please contact support@investit-academy.de
auth.missing-ios-bundle-id: The app data on your device is incorrect. Please reinstall the app. If the error persists, please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.missing-oauth-client-secret: Your registration could not be processed. Please contact support@investit-academy.de
auth.missing-uid: Your user ID could not be loaded. Please restart the app. If the problem persists, please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.network-request-failed: The server could not be contacted (timeout).
auth.not-logged-in-to-update-password: To change your password, you must be logged in. If you have forgotten your password, you can request a password reset email instead.
auth.not-logged-in-to-verify: To request a verification email, you must be logged in.
auth.operation-not-allowed: The login service is currently disabled. Please try again later.
auth.project-not-found: The connection to the server could not be established. Please contact support@investit-academy.de
auth.requires-recent-login: For security reasons, please log in first.
auth.session-cookie-expired: A cookie expired during your request. Please log out and restart the app.
auth.session-cookie-revoked: A cookie was revoked during your request. Please log out and restart the app.
auth.too-many-requests: Too many registration requests were sent. Please try again later.
auth.uid-already-exists: Your user ID could not be set. Please try to register again.
auth.unauthorized-continue-uri: Your registration request could not be processed. Please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please contact support@investit-academy.de
auth.user-disabled: The user has been deactivated by the system. If you think this is an error, please contact support@investit-academy.de.
auth.user-not-found: Your email or password is not correct. Check for spelling errors?
auth.weak-password: The password you entered is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
auth.wrong-password: Your email or password is not correct. Check for spelling errors?

add-amount.dialog-label-title-expenses: Please add an amount to your expense!
add-amount.dialog-label-title-income: Please add an amount to your income!

change-entry.dialog-label-change: Which entry do you want to change?

delete-entry.dialog-label-delete: Do you really want to delete this entry?
delete-entry.dialog-label-deleterep: Which entry do you want to delete?

repeat.monthly: At the beginning of the month

home_screen_card.home-screen-card-toast: Swipe left and right to view previous or upcoming months. Press and hold to return to the current month.

errors.last-mail-missing: The PIN could not be assigned to an account

lock_screen.toast-pin-changed: The PIN has been changed successfully.
lock_screen.toast-pin-deactivated: The PIN lock has been deactivated.
lock_screen.toast-pin-set: You have successfully activated the PIN lock!

main.label-wip: Work in progress. Please check back soon.

onboarding_screen.card1-description: Your new budgeting assistant is already waiting for you.
onboarding_screen.card2-description: It couldn’t be any simpler: With our tracking feature, you always know exactly how much money you have right now.
onboarding_screen.card3-description: With our Academy feature you can access a broad selection of free videos on many topics from the world of finance!
onboarding_screen.card4-description: Linum automatically generates relevant statistics for you. This way you can track how you're doing with your budget.
onboarding_screen.cta-login: Have an account? Sign in here.
onboarding_screen.cta-register: Don't have an account? Sign up here
onboarding_screen.login-email-errorlabel: Please enter a valid email address.
onboarding_screen.register-email-errorlabel: Please enter a valid email address.
onboarding_screen.register-password-errorlabel: Please enter a password with at least 6 characters.

register-privacy.label-leading: By registering you agree to our

language-settings.label-tooltip: Currently, only the system language is supported. Supported languages: German, English.

pin-lock.label-tooltip: If the PIN lock is active, you will need to enter your personal PIN code upon starting the app to protect your data.

standard-account.label-tooltip: These accounts are used by default for each new income/expense. You can also change them individually.

standard-category.label-tooltip: These categories are used by default for each new income/expense/transaction. You can also change them individually.

standard-currency.label-tooltip: This currency is used by default for every new transaction. You can also change it individually.

system-settings.button-forgot-password-tooltip: You can request a password reset here if you forgot your old password.
